description: This file defines asynchronous hooks and a tool function to fetch top Hacker News stories using the httpx library, integrating with an Agent class and utilizing pre- and post-execution hooks.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can execute tools and maintain context.

methods.name: pre_hook
methods.description: Asynchronous function called before executing the main tool, logs the function name.

methods.name: post_hook
methods.description: Asynchronous function called after executing the main tool, logs the function name.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Asynchronous tool function that fetches and yields top Hacker News stories as JSON strings.
